game.name: Our Little Brothers
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Save kidnapped dogs. Rescue them from death at the hands of a criminal organization. Our Little Brothers is a spectacular third-person shooter in which, with the help of bullet time and environmental destruction, you can save many four-legged lives and uncover a terrifying conspiracy.
